title: Stone Age Curling
description: Launch prehistoric stones across the ice and use growth rays to make them bigger! Land closest to the center to score points.
controls: Left Stick/WASD: Aim direction | SPACE: Hold to charge power, release to shoot stone | Z: Fire growth ray to enlarge your stone
howToPlay: Take turns launching stones toward the target circles. Use your growth ray to make your stone bigger - bigger stones can knock opponents away! Score points based on how close your stones are to the center. First to 50 points wins, or highest score when time runs out!
